SA01n797:1335: atthantaraṃ sādhayatā kici taṃ sadisaṃ phalaṃ |
SA01n797:1336: dassiyate asantaṃ vā santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ || 306 ||
SA01n797:1338: darśayate sadasadvāpi proktā sā tu nirdaśanā ||
SA01n797:1349: vibhūtyā mahadarthantu aghīptyāṃ yasya vā syāt |
SA01n797:1359: gopetvā vaṇṇaniyamaṃ yaṃ kiñci dassiyate paraṃ |
SA01n797:1360: asamaṃ vā samaṃ tassa yadi sā vañcanā matā || 312 ||
SA01n797:1362: asamaṃ vā samaṃ tasya yadi sā vañcanā matā ||
SA01n797:1363: purato na sahassesu na pañcesu ca tādino |
SA01n797:1365: purato na sahastreṣuḥ na pñceṣuśca tāddaśaḥ |
SA01n797:1379: uttaraṃ uttaraṃ yattha pubba pubba visesanaṃ |
SA01n797:1387: asantuṭaṭho yatineva santoso na nālayā hato |
SA01n797:1396: mahanti vindate kanti so'pi teneva tādisi || 321 ||
SA01n797:1398: mahatīṃ vindate kānti so'pi tenava tāddaśīm ||
SA01n797:1399: kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa kriyāya ca guṇassa ca |
SA01n797:1404: vijumbhati ca candena samaṃ tammukha candimā || 322 ||
SA01n797:1406: vijumbhate ca candreṇa samaṃ te mukha candramāḥ ||
SA01n797:1408: pāpaṃ, disā suvimalā saha sajjana cetasā || 324 ||
SA01n797:1415: guṇā sabhāva madhurā api lokeka bandhuno |
SA01n797:1419: yassa kassaci dānena yassa kassaci vatthuno |
SA01n797:1421: yasya kasyāpi dānena yasya kasyāpi vastunaḥ |
SA01n797:1423: purā paresaṃ datvā na manuñña nayanādikaṃ |
SA01n797:1425: purā parebhyo datvā nu manojñaṃ nayanādikam |
SA01n797:1428: saṃsayāpagataṃ vatthu yattha soyaṃ bhamo mato || 329 ||
SA01n797:1430: saṃśayāpagataṃ vastu yatra so'yaṃ bhramo mataḥ ||
SA01n797:1436: yena kenaci vaṇṇena bhāvo nāmāya mīrito || 331 ||
SA01n797:1439: nanu te yeva santāno sāgarā na kulā calā |
SA01n797:1440: manampi mariyādaṃ ye saṃvuṭṭhepi jahanti no ||
SA01n797:1441: na nu te eva santānaḥ sāgarā nakulā calāḥ |
SA01n797:1442: manasāpi ca maryyādāṃ ye saṃvṛṣṭe'i jahanti no ||
SA01n797:1446: aho gāḍhaṃ nimugge'i sukhayatyeva te jane || 334 ||
SA01n797:1451: madhū'va munino vācā na sampīṇotikaṃ janaṃ || 335 ||
SA01n797:1453: yathāmadhu munevaco na samprīṇanti kaṃ janam ||
SA01n797:1459: rasavantaṃ ti taṃ ñeyyaṃ rasavanta vidhāna to || 337 ||
SA01n797:1473: ko nāma passitumalaṃ khalu tā samantaṃ || 339 ||
SA01n797:1494: cittavutti visesā tu bhāvayanti rasā yato |
SA01n797:1502: rati hāso ca soko ca kodhussāhabhayaṃ i ca |
SA01n797:1507: ye te caranti sīlena te honti vyabhicāriṇo || 345 ||
SA01n797:1509: ye te caranti śīlena bhavanti vyabhicāriṇaḥ ||
SA01n797:1522: thambha palaya romāñca tathā sedassu vepathu |
SA01n797:1525: vaivarṇya virvaratā bhāvā aṣṭaite hi sāttvikāḥ ||
SA01n797:1526: yadā ratyādayo bhāvā dhiti sīlā na honti ce |
SA01n797:1527: tadā savvepi te bhāvā bhavanti vyabhicāriṇo || 349 ||
SA01n797:1528: yadā ratyādayo bhāvā dhṛtiśīlā na bhavanti cet |
SA01n797:1529: tadā sarve'i te bhāvā bhavanti vyabhicāriṇāḥ ||
SA01n797:1531: yo siyā bodhakaṃ tesaṃ anubhāvo' yamīrito || 350 ||
SA01n797:1534: neka hetu manovutti visesaṃ ca vibhāvitu |
SA01n797:1538: sabibhāvānubhāvehi bhāvā te te yathā' rahaṃ |
SA01n797:1540: sa vibhāvānubhāvai hi mhāvaste te yathārham |
SA01n797:1566: yutyā bhāvānubhāvā te nibandhā posayanti naṃ |
SA01n797:1572: pamipose miyā hasmo bhiyyo tthippabhutīna mo || 360 ||
SA01n797:1576: paripoṣe syāddhāsyaḥ bhūyaḥ strī prabhṛtīnāṃ saḥ ||
SA01n797:1580: dve dve hassā kathitā cesaṃ jeṭṭhe majjhe jamme' i ca kamato ||
SA01n797:1586: dve dve hāsyāḥkathitāścaiṣāṃ jyeṣṭhe madhye kaniṣṭhe ca kramataḥ |
SA01n797:1620: bhāvādihi tudukkaso santo santa nise vito || 371 ||
